name: MAIWO External Hard Drive Enclosure for 7mm 9.5mm 2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD, 5Gbps USB C to SATA Adapter Storage Case, 6TB Capacity (White)
short_description: 【Compatibility】This external hard drive case supports 2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD in size 7mm 9.5mm, perfect for expanding storage. The transparent white enclosure design allow you easy to find your drives among diverse hard drive enclosures.
【5Gbps Transmission Speed】This hard disk enclosure equips with Type-C output port, delivers up to 5Gbps transfer speeds and supports UASP for faster performance with Windows 8 or above.
【Large Capacity】This SATA HDD/SSD reader supports 6TB extra storage for your PC, providing ample space for your games, entertainment and working.
【Tool Free】Tool Free - this external hard drive to USB C adapter requires no tools or drivers for setup which is easy to use. Simply pug and play to reduce setup time and streamline operation.
【Feature】 LED Indicator / Anti Shock Pads / High-Strength ABS Plastic / 12.6x7.8x1.4cm Ultra Thin Case

NOTE: If your drive is a new one (1)Insert drive and connect the enclosure to PC. (2)Hard Disk Initialization: Computer-Manage-Disk Management-find new disk and initialize (NOTE: Please choose MBR if the capacity of your disk is less than 2TB, choose GPT if larger than 2TB.) (3)Disk Partition and Format: New disk will become “Disk 1” after initialization, right click “Disk 1” and choose “New Simple Volume” to do partition, choose the capacity you need and choose “Formatting”.
product_details: Compatible Devices Laptop, Mackbook, Mackbook Pro, Personal Computer, Smartphone, Tablet
Data Transfer Rate 5 Gigabits Per Second

name: UGREEN SSD Enclosure, Tool-Free USB C External, 10Gbps M.2 NVMe to USB Adapter/Reader Supports M and B&M Keys and Size 2230/2242 /2260/2280 SSDs
short_description: 10Gbps NVMe Enclosure: With the latest USB 3.2 Gen2, this M.2 enclosure can achieve a data transfer rate of 10Gbps. Backward compatible with USB 3.1 and USB 3.0. Note: 10G speeds need to be matched with a USB C 3.2 GEN2 data cable

Tool-free SSD Enclosure: Tool-free NVMe SSD enclosure for quick and easy installation. Plug and play, no drivers required. The buckle design of the M.2 SSD enclosure can ensure stable and fast transfer

Broad Compatibility: The UGREEN M.2 NVMe SSD enclosure is specially designed to support NMVe protocol M/B&M keys and for 2230/ 2242/ 2260/2280 size SSDs up to 8TB. The M.2 NVMe enclosure is applicable for Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android, IOS systems.(Does not support SATA NGFF SSD or mSATA SSD)

Security & Stability: USB C NVMe enclosure adopts advanced RTL9210 chip with short-circuit, over-current and multi-protection to ensure the safety of your SSD and valuable data, and supports UASP/ Trim with high transfer speed

Compact & Portable: This ultra-slim aluminium external NVMe enclosure with extra silicone case is portable yet durable, and much easier to carry with this M.2 to USB adapter, making it ideal for travelling
product_details: Compatible Devices Computer, Laptop, Samsung/WD/Toshiba/Crucial/Seagate/Sandisk, Smartphone, Tablet

name: POSUGEAR 2.5'' External Hard Drive Enclosure, 6Gbps USB C 3.1 Gen 2 to SATA III Tool-Free External Hard Drive Case for 7mm/9.5mm 2.5 inch SSD HDD with UASP, Compatible with WD Toshiba Samsung PS4 Xbox
short_description: 2024 New Sliding Hard Drive Enclosure: Step 1 slides the enclosure open, step 2 places the hard drive into the hard drive enclosure and pushes it firmly in place, step 3 slides the enclosure closed along the cover tracks. Tip: When removing the hard drive, lift up along the bottom groove to remove the hard drive.

Super Speed 6Gbps & UASP: Hard drive enclosure Adopted USB3.1 high speed transfer supports 6Gbps transfer rate and UASP+TRIM dual acceleration protocol, 35% faster than traditional USB 3.0, transfer HD movies, music and data in 3 seconds.

Upgrade Intelligent Chip: The external hard drive enclosure enclosure adopts a high performance chip with fast recognition, stable reading and equipped with automatic hibernation function, providing over current, over voltage and over heat protection to ensure transmission safety.

All Round Protection: The hdd/ssd enclosure is made of PC+ABS material shell effectively anti drop and anti shock, protects the hard drive from impact and scratches, in addition to the EVA sponge can ensure the stable connection between the hard drive and the SATA interface.

Universal Compatibility: This external ssd/hdd enclosure is designed for 2.5 inch 7mm/9.5mm SATA hard drive and SSD up to 4TB. Compatible with Windows, Linux and Mac OS and above and compatible with Western Digital, Toshiba, Samsung, Kingston, Crucial, Hitachi hard drives, etc. Widely used in PC, Laptop, Xbox, PS5/PS4/PS3, Router and so on. (Also backward compatible with USB 2.0 or 1.1)

Easy to Install and Use: This external hard drive case is tool less installation, plug & play, no driver required. Supports hot swappable, no extra power supply required. Equipped with LED indicators to easily show the working status.

name: SABRENT USB C NVMe Enclosure, Tool-Free M.2 SSD Case for 2230-2280, 10Gbps USB 3.2 Gen 2 Adapter, Aluminum Cooling, External M.2 Drive Enclosure for NVMe SSDs (EC-PNVO)
short_description: Flip-Open Tool-Free Design: Open the cover, insert your NVMe SSD, lock it in place, and close—no screws or tools required. Fast and simple for upgrades, cloning, troubleshooting, and portable tech work.

Cooler 10Gbps Performance: The aluminum enclosure presses the thermal pad directly against your SSD for better heat transfer and more stable 10Gbps speeds than slide-in enclosures. Ideal for long transfers and heavy workloads.
NVMe Only for Maximum Speed: Supports M.2 NVMe SSDs in sizes 2230, 2242, 2260, and 2280 up to at least 8TB. Not compatible with M.2 SATA SSDs.
USB C Plug-and-Play: Connect with USB C for up to 10Gbps using USB 3.2 Gen 2. No drivers or external power needed. Works with laptops, desktops, gaming handhelds, and USB C devices.

Portable and Durable Aluminum Build: Reinforced ABS frame with an aluminum alloy top keeps your SSD protected and cool. Slim, lightweight, and perfect for creators, gamers, and anyone needing fast portable storage.
product_description: Fast NVMe Storage Made Simple The SABRENT EC-PNVO turns any M.2 NVMe SSD into fast, portable storage with an easy flip-open design. Just open the lid, insert your SSD, lock it, and close—no screws or tools required. 10Gbps USB C Speeds Move files, photos, and videos at up to 10Gbps using USB 3.2 Gen 2. Perfect for backups, media projects, and everyday portable storage. Fully plug-and-play with laptops, desktops, and USB C devices. Keeps Your SSD Cooler The aluminum top presses the thermal pad directly onto your SSD for better heat dissipation than slide-in enclosures. This helps maintain stable performance during long transfers, large copies, and heavy workloads. Supports M.2 NVMe 2230–2280 SSDs Fits M.2 NVMe drives in sizes 2230, 2242, 2260, and 2280 , up to at least 8TB. NVMe only — not compatible with M.2 SATA SSDs. Portable, Durable, and Ready for Anything Reinforced ABS frame with an aluminum alloy top keeps your drive protected on the go. Works instantly with Windows, Mac, and Linux without drivers or external power. The EC-PNVO gives you fast NVMe performance, simple tool-free installation, and cooler operation— all in a compact design built to outperform the alternatives.
product_details: Data Transfer Rate 1250 Megabytes Per Second

Intelligent Detection of Auto-sleep: The usb3.1 hard drive enclosure with the function of 10 minutes auto sleep mode with no operation, which can greatly reducing the invalid energy consumption, prolonging the service life of the hard case and protect the hard drive data for you
